segments.text: I notice the water spilling over the sink, and it’s getting worse by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying that plate like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so bold, taking cookies right behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is already wobbling, and he doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for the woman to realize what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm compared to this mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to be so shocked when she finally turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, it’s like he’s asking for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I almost feel bad for the woman when she sees the puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR
